name: Wikipedia | Full width - Modern & Darkness UI
description: A clean, simple, dark, and minimal look for Wikipedia. Modern, and readable.
additional_info:
Some minor bugs can appear, because of the diversity of Wikipedia.
This problem is related to different languages and rules of styles used by the authors / articles.

For example: the same item may be displayed correctly in a language but contain bugs in another language.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2015/08/15 : Some bug fixes, thank Niklasg.
2016/01/10 : Minor bug fixe, like background of "bandeau-niveau-modere".
